com.crudetech.geometry.geom2d

Class Point2d

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.crudetech.geometry.geom2d.Point2d
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ToleranceComparable<Point2d>, Transformable2d<Point2d>

    public final class Point2d
extends Object
implements ToleranceComparable<Point2d>, Transformable2d<Point2d>
    Represents a point in 2D space.

    This class is not very suitable to serve as a hash key. For more details refer to the equals(Object) method.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Object o)
        Two points are considered equal when their distance is less than the point tolerance of the global tolerance object. This means that changing the global tolerance object influences the results of equals and hashCode().

        This detail makes this class extremely unsuitable as a hash keys. If you need to store instances of these objects in such a container, consider using EqualityComparable or one of the convenience collection wrappers like EqualityComparableMap in conjunction with a ToleranceComparer instance.

        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Parameters:
        o -
        Returns:
